Reviews.Title: “One of the best budget hotels in Shepherds Bush.”
Reviews.Author: tony h
Reviews.Content: stayed budget hotels shepherds bush probably feel bit diy clean ensuite facilities decent front hotel little noisy wood lane busy road

Reviews.Title: “Horrendous - dont go there!”
Reviews.Author: jen_reg
Reviews.Content: situation thats generous handy opposite westfield centre bbc studios sheets clean rest filthy walls grotty chipped furniture toiletries towels sandpaper breakfast consisted 3 cold croissants cold toast coffee disgusting despite putting milk begrudgingly spoken rudely finished people waiting people mouldy toast refused luckily booked 1 night engagement found elsewhere

Reviews.Title: “Terrible Bed and Horrible Lady”
Reviews.Author: travelgweilo
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights pay checking wished car park joke literally miles bad direction lady reception real bad attitude nice person argues guests people nice sleep springs poke mattress noisy reception phone constantly night stay

Reviews.Title: “Do not book this hotel”
Reviews.Author: Hattie66
Reviews.Content: hotel horrid dirty falling apart woke morning faced runing water couldnt shower toilet flush managerowner unhelpful matter refund offered recommend

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic!”
Reviews.Author: Girl1986
Reviews.Content: highly recommend hotel stayed friend agree interior wasnt modern clean beds getting hot water stayed top floor breakfast nice people hotel service minded polite hotel close underground stations theres getting theres little noise traffic hey youre london expect london shopping sightseeing clubbing hotel nice clean sleep thats exactly excellent hotel cheap clean close central london

Reviews.Title: “Grotty Hotel”
Reviews.Author: joe_santoro
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights bathroom size wardrobe shower bathroom bed dirty horrible road noise loud sleep move shower door fell apart trying bathroom dirty leave

HotelInfo.Name: Abbey Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: 23 Wood Lane | Shepherds Bush, London W12 7DP, England
